Medicus medicatus, or, The physicians religion cured by a lenitive or gentle potion with some animadversions upon Sir Kenelme Digbie's observations on Religio medici / by Alexander Ross. Ross, Alexander, 1591-1654. Ross, Alexander, 1591-1654. Animadversions upon Sir Kenelme Digbie's Observations on Religio medici.
[14], 112 p.
Printed by James Young, and are to be sold by Charles Green ..., London : 1645.
"Animadversions upon Sir Kenelme Digbie's Observations on Religio medici" (p. 81) has special t.p. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
